title: A Complete Playlist About 'Strumming The Six String'
body:
Chuck Berry, Rosanne Cash and The Beatles all performed memorable songs about rock's definitive instrument.
                
                
                
            Chuck Berry, Rosanne Cash and The Beatles all performed memorable songs about rock's definitive instrument.It all started with a Tweet. I  to our World Cafe followers:other than "anyone can play guitar" by radiohead and "money for nothing" by dire straits what are the best songs about literally playing the guitar?I received so many submissions, that I made a whole playlist out of it! So click "play" and strap in for a journey of great jams about "strumming the six-string" and "shredding the axe!" Enjoy this extended list of songs from the hour-long set on today's show – featuring , , , , and so many more.
